Title: Relates to enacting additional conditions on authorized lenders of reverse mortgages
Summary: Adds new conditions on authorized lenders of reverse mortgages including: delivery of a plain language notice, providing the borrower with a reverse mortgage worksheet guide and counseling, and a lapse of seven days between the reverse mortgage counseling and acceptance of the borrower's final application.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to conditions on lenders who extend reverse mortgages to persons over sixty and seventy years old
